title: LEAGUE RANKED SYSTEM Summary // TOPIC: +POINTS -POINTS // WHEN I GET MORE POINTS / LESS POINTS
body:
Hi fellows,

i done some ranked matches now it must be over 200 games and i wonder bout some stats:

AT THE BEGINNING OF MY RANKED CARIER I EARN +-24 POINTS FOR A WIN 
AND LOOSE -24 POINTS FOR A LOOSE.

NOW I EARN +12 POINTS EVERY WIN
AND LOOSE -24 POINTS FOR A LOOSE.

so can smd of u number_junks offer a detailed explanation when the earned points increase / delay. What stats have influences and is it possible to increase them again.

If i go to a higher elo rank (for example from silver 5 to silver 4) does the points reset to normal +24?  Or depens it on the whole season....
